General Vorpal took notice of that. Using his powers, he sent a reply
to each of his soldiers.

Vorpal: Minions! We are being challenged! Converge on Darkfate's and
Nightstrike's position! Leave no survivor!

********

The Silver Wing ship was coming closer. Soon, its battle-hungry
troopers would swarm out of the metal beast and overwhelm the two
minions. Razorwing was happy the way things went.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightstrike/Darkfate:
> 
> Nightstrike and Darkfate covered behind a tower and when the have
some chance they fire back.
> 
> "Milord"said Nightstrike"We need some back up here, SIlverwings are
here..."
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Thursday, August 04, 2005 8:23 AM
>   Subject: Re: Red alert in low orbit (Minions on action)
> 
> 
>   The Blackfeather was burning its way up the atmosphere until it was in
>   sight of the factory being attacked. The commander ordered that every
>   cannons be directed at the Minions and allowed for fire at will.
> 
>   Soon, a laser storm was fired at the Minions. The troopers inside the
>   warship were ready, but they were still to far to unload and engage.
